SELECT SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, HASHTAG, WDATE, SHOPNAME, ADDRESS, READCNT FROM EATAEWONBBS WHERE 1=1
AND ID=#{search}
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND HASHTAG LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND SHOPNAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
ORDER BY READCNT DESC

SELECT ID, SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT ,HASHTAG, WDATE, ADDRESS, READCNT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY READCNT DESC) AS RNUM, ID, SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT ,HASHTAG, WDATE, ADDRESS, READCNT FROM EATAEWONBBS WHERE 1=1
AND ID=#{search}
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND HASHTAG LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND SHOPNAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
ORDER BY READCNT DESC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) AS CNT FROM EATAEWONBBS WHERE 1=1
AND ID=#{search}
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND HASHTAG LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'

SELECT s.seq, b.title, b.hashtag, b.shopname, b.address FROM EATAEWONSCRAP s , EATAEWONBBS b WHERE s.id = b.id
